ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 42
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I an a fisher and just have to tell you that regular fishing poles fit in backpacks already right now.  This is just my guess but maybe I was thinking that
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I an a fisher and just have to tell you that regular fishing poles fit
in backpacks already right now. This is just my guess but maybe I was
thinking that the collapsable ones weighed less or maybe couldn't break.
They would have to have some improvement over the regular ones right now...
but being able to fit in backpacks wouldn't be it. See ya

-Nazmir-
17th wizard on Povar

>
>
>I can answer that one without even seeing them. A
>telescope works similar to a ranger (?) spell (can't
>remember the name of it). It essentially 'zooms' the
>screen so that you can see things farther away from
>you that you normally couldn't see. (Is that train of
>orcs still chasing me? Hmm better try the telescope.)
>
>The collaspable fishing rod is just a regular fishing
>pole that will fit in your bakpack - as it stands now,
>a normal fishingpole you buy at a merchant will not
>fit into any pack making it cumbersome to bring with
>you on the road.
>
>Quasinom de Plume of Ak'anon
>Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > Any news on exactly what they do or their stats
> > now that they are really here?
>
